attributes.action: remove unnecessary and harmful additives from packaged food.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want our food to be pure - free from harmful chemicals, colours, flavourings and preservatives - just the way nature intended. 

Suggestions:

Large food stores should have more fresh sections where the food has been made and/or packaged on the premises.

Food which has chemicals in should be clearly marked and the chemicals explained.

Have a conscience and sign our petition.
